data.title: About Us
data.text:
Hours

Office Tower: 24/7

Shopping Centre: Mon to Fri, 9 AM - 6 PM

Select shops and restaurants open earlier than 9 AM and/or remain open after 6 PM. Some are open on Saturday, check the Store Directory for individual store hours.

First Canadian Place

Unrivaled as Canada’s tallest business landmark since 1975, First Canadian Place towers 72 stories above Toronto’s Financial District. This Brookfield property was ahead of its time, exceeding building code requirements and operational standards while providing a truly comprehensive array of tenant services and amenities, including three levels of retail, restaurants and services.

First Canadian Place Management Office

100 King Street West, Concourse Level

Toronto, ON M5X 1A9

T: 416-862-8138

E: fcpinfo@brookfield.com

Office hours: Mon to Fri, 8:30 AM - 5 PM

Exchange Tower

Home to the Toronto Stock Exchange, the 36-storey property provides Toronto’s financial services industry with convenient access to an array of shops and services. Exchange Tower is conveniently linked to transit and neighbouring properties via the underground PATH system and was uniquely designed to complement the existing architecture of Brookfield’s First Canadian Place, with which it shares parking and loading dock facilities, concourse-level and ground floor.

Exchange Tower Management Office

130 King Street West, Suite 2105

Toronto, ON M5X 2A2

T: 416-864-6210

E: exchangetower@brookfield.com

Office hours: Mon to Fri, 8:30 AM - 5 PM
